predicate.note: Frames file for 'hypothesize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: passive
example.text: It might be alleged that TV has done more than its share to popularize and promote non-violent civil disobedience, so the second situation hypothesized *trace* above would be simply a case of ``chickens coming home to roost.''

example.name: active
example.text: John hypothesized that Mary was secretly lusting after him.
example.arg: Mary was secretly lusting after him
